subject: Alpine Skiing
Olympic Games (2010)
World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Two years after a serious crash almost derailed his career, World Cup champion Aksel Lund Svindal stands as the 2010 Olympics favorite in four skiing events.
snippet: Two years after a serious crash almost derailed his career, World Cup champion Aksel Lund Svindal stands as the 2010 Olympics favorite in four skiing events.
